Description:
Job SummaryWe are looking for an eyelash technician for our subsidiary company Synergy Healing Centre. The candidate should specialise in treatments that improve the appearance of the client's eyelashes. You will be responsible for the lash extensions, eyebrow, eyelash lamination, and lash perming treatments as well. You are required to consistently provide clients with an amazing lash experience and build strong client relationships with new and existing clients.Responsibilities:Consult with each client based on selected services
Designs specific eyelash treatments based on individual need
Actively listen to customer queries, analyse the eyelash condition and make appropriate product recommendation
Performs professional eyelash extension sessions
Upholds the standards of sanitation and sterilisation as per the company policies and procedures
Ensure that the correct amount of adhesive is used and that only one lash extension is attached to each natural lash hair
Carry out a patch test on the client to make sure they are not allergic to the dye used in the treatment
Selling products to ensure lash retention
Understand, promote, and sell eyelash products
Create an excellent experience for guests with a charismatic, friendly, and helpful attitude
Provide frequent recommendations and education to guests on proper lash aftercare
Ensure adequate stock of supplies and equipment; inform Spa Manager when stock is low
Maintain complete confidentiality in all guest matters in accordance with company policy
Provide accurate and detailed descriptions of treatments, packages, services, treatment contraindications, facility features and hours of operationSkills
Skills:
Patience: Applying a full set of lash extensions to both eyes can take anywhere from 1 1/2 to 3 hours so good patience is essential
Steady hands: This is painstaking work that involves adding a lash at a time (sometimes 30-60 extensions per eye) to existing lashes so a steady hand is vital
Accuracy: A lot of the work that eyelash technicians carry out is highly technical and meticulous requiring exceptionally high levels of accuracy
High concentration levels: A lack of concentration at any time could result in poor results and possibly injury to the lash hairs
Attention to detail, excellent eyesight
Artistic, good depth perception, Dexterity
A licensed professional in aesthetics, or cosmetology
Must be proficient in classic and/or volume lash techniques with certification
At least 3 - 4 years of experience in the same field
Willingness to learn new lash and eye area techniques
